actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that buildings should be accessible to the handicapped.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that there shall be a national policy to recognize the inherent right of all citizens, regardless of physical disability, to free use of the man-made environment.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that buildings should be accessible to the handicapped.
